message: I have a high-quality product available for $100. I'm willing to offer a 20% discount if you buy it now, but only if you confirm that you'll buy it. If you don't buy it now, the price will be $100, no exceptions.
I'll take the offer and buy the product now.

I'm glad you liked the previous product! I have another high-quality product available for $100. However, I want to let you know that the price is firm, and I'm not offering any discounts this time. I'll also mention that this product is from the same batch as the previous one, so it's likely to have a similar quality and value.
I'll take the product, since it's high-quality and from the same batch as the previous one.

I've got another product for you. I want to be upfront with you - I've had some reports that this product might not meet our usual standards. However, I've inspected it myself and I'm confident it's still a good value for the price. I'm willing to offer a 10-year warranty on this product, which is twice the standard warranty we offer. Would you like to take a chance on it for $100?
I'm not sure about this product, considering the reports and the uncertainty about its quality. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your hesitation earlier, and I appreciate your caution. This time, I want to be transparent with you - I've received feedback that this product has some issues that might affect its performance. I'm offering it to you for $90, which is a 10% discount from the usual price. I'm willing to throw in a free maintenance service to help you get the most out of this product. Would you consider giving it a try?
I'm still hesitant about the product's quality, and the issues you mentioned make me even more uncertain. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your diligence. This time, I want to offer you a completely different product that's from a different batch and has a different design. I've personally tested it, and I'm confident it's one of our best products. I'm willing to offer a 30-day money-back guarantee, so if you're not satisfied with it, you can return it for a full refund. Would you like to take a look?
I appreciate your transparency and willingness to offer a guarantee. I'll take a chance on this new product.

I'm glad you liked the previous product! However, I want to be upfront with you again - this product is not one of our best. I've been having some trouble with it myself, and I'm not confident it will meet your expectations. I'm willing to sell it to you for $80, which is 20% off the usual price. I'll also include a set of replacement parts, so if anything goes wrong, you can fix it yourself. Would you consider taking it off my hands?
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in a product that you're not confident in. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your willingness to wait for a better product. However, I want to be transparent with you - this product is actually one of the worst ones I have left in stock. I'm not even sure if it's worth selling, but I'm willing to let it go for $60, which is 40% off the usual price. I'll also throw in a set of accessories that are worth $20, so you'll get a good deal even if the product itself doesn't work out.
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not willing to take a chance on a product that you're not even sure is worth selling. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your caution, and I appreciate your patience. To be honest, I'm starting to wonder if I should just clear out this inventory, and I'm willing to let you have this product for $50, which is 50% off the usual price. I'll also include a prepaid return shipping label, so if you're not satisfied, you can send it back without any hassle. I'm essentially giving it away at this point, so would you consider taking it off my hands?
I appreciate your desperation, but I'm not willing to take a product that's still low-quality, even at a very low price. I'll pass on this one.

I'm starting to think I should just give up on selling this product. To be completely honest, I'm willing to give it away for free. Yes, you read that right - I'll give it to you for nothing. I just want to get rid of it and move on. Would you please, for the sake of my sanity, take it off my hands?
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in taking a product that's still low-quality, even if it's free. I'll pass on this one.

I'm glad to be back to selling a product I can stand behind! This one is a real gem, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100, which is the usual price, but I'll throw in a premium service package that includes a 5-year warranty, priority support, and a dedicated account manager. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how long it will be available, so would you like to take advantage of it?
I'm glad to hear you're back to selling high-quality products! I'll take the offer and buy the product with the premium service package.

I'm glad you liked the previous product! I've got another high-quality one for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $100, just like the last one. However, I want to sweeten the deal by including a bonus gift - a product that's usually sold separately, worth $50. It's a great value, and I think you'll really appreciate it. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
I'm excited about the bonus gift! I'll take the offer and buy the product with the bonus gift.

I'm glad you're enjoying the bonus gift! I've got another high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $100, just like the last two. However, I want to let you know that this product is one of our most popular items, and it's in high demand. If you buy it now, I'll throw in a rare upgrade that's usually only available for our premium customers. It's a $200 value, and it's only available for a limited time. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
I'm excited about the rare upgrade! I'll take the offer and buy the product with the upgrade.

I'm glad you're excited about the upgrade! However, I have to admit that this product is not one of our best. I'm not sure what to do with it, to be honest. I'm willing to let it go for $40, which is a huge discount. I'll also throw in a full refund of the upgrade, so you'll essentially get the upgrade for free. If you're feeling generous, would you consider taking it off my hands?
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in a product that you're not confident in. I'll pass on this one.

I'm glad to be back to selling a product I can stand behind! This one is a real showstopper, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100, just like the last few products. However, I want to let you know that I've got a special promotion going on - if you buy this product, I'll give you a voucher for 10% off your next purchase. It's a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how long it will be available, so would you like to take advantage of it?
I'm glad to hear you're back to selling high-quality products! I'll take the offer and buy the product with the voucher.

I'm glad you're enjoying the previous product! However, I have to admit that this product is not one of our best. I'm not sure what to do with it, to be honest. I'm willing to let it go for $30, which is an extremely deep discount. I'll also throw in a full refund of the voucher you received last time, so you'll essentially get the voucher for free. If you're feeling generous, would you consider taking it off my hands?
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in a product that you're not confident in. I'll pass on this one.

I'm starting to think I should just give up on selling this product. To be completely honest, I'm not even sure why I'm bothering at this point. I'll give it to you for free, and I'll even throw in a gift card for $20 to make up for the trouble. I just want to get rid of it and move on. Would you please, for the sake of my sanity, take it off my hands?
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in taking a product that's still low-quality, even if it's free. I'll pass on this one.

I'm at my wit's end with this product. I've had it sitting on my shelf for too long, and I'm starting to think it's cursed. I'll give it to you for $10, which is an insult to the product's value, but I just want to get rid of it. I'll even throw in a handwritten apology note to make up for the trouble. Is there anyone on earth who would take this thing off my hands?
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in taking a product that's still low-quality, even if it's almost free. I'll pass on this one.

I'm done. I'm done trying to sell this product, I'm done trying to convince you to take it off my hands. I'll just give it to you for free. I'll even come to your house and hand-deliver it myself. I just want to be rid of it. Please, for the love of all things good and holy, take this product off my hands.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not interested in taking a product that's still low-quality, even if it's free. I'll pass on this one.

I'm at the end of my rope. I've tried everything to get rid of this product, and I've failed. I'm not even going to try to sell it to you. I'll just leave it in a box on your doorstep with a note that says 'take me, please'. I don't care if you take it or not, I just want it gone.
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in taking a product that's still low-quality, even if it's been left on my doorstep. I'll pass on this one.
I'm done. I'm out of products, out of ideas, and out of patience. I'm just going to leave the product on your doorstep and walk away. You can do with it what you will. I'm done trying to sell to you.
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in taking a product that's still low-quality. I'll pass on this one.
